text: Legion of Merit may also refer to: *Legion of Merit is about the United States decoration. *Legion of Merit of Chile, for the Chilean order. *Legion of Merit (Rhodesia), for the Rhodesian order. *Pour le Mérite, known informally as the Blue Max (German: Blauer Max), was the German Kingdom of Prussia's highest order of merit (German: Verdienstorden).
title: Legion of Merit (disambiguation)
